name: current (itch) (zzox)
description:
You are tasked with reconnecting underwater grids before the power is turned on.

Controls:
Arrows - Move
R - Restart Level
Space/Enter - Select

Play in Chrome or Firefox

Used Phaser 3, my boilerplate and a font from Bartek Nowak.
